name: Vitality Network
command:
/* YOU MUST ENABLE THE VITALITY NETWORK TRIGGER TO USE THIS MACRO
 * Select the token with vitality network
 * Target the token that will receive the transfer
 * Use the slider to select how many Hit Points to transfer
 * Upon confirmation, the Hit Points will be deducted from your vitality network and sent as a healing roll to chat. PF2e Toolbelt is recommended for targetting goodness.
*/
game.triggerTrove.api.transferVitality();
author: aFB5cis1KjjFO8v2
